import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Redirect, useHistory, Link } from "react-router-dom" class ArticaleEdit extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { title: '', is_publish: true, publish_date: '', content: '', image: '', redirect: false } } getUsersArticle() { const { id } = this.props.match.params // const title = "" // const is_publish = "" // const publish_date = "" // const content = "" // const image = "" axios.get(`/api/v1/articles/${id}`,{}) .then(res => { const data = res.data if(data.success){ title = data.title is_publish = data.is_publish publish_date= data.publish_date content = data.content image = data.image this.setState({title}) this.setState({is_publish}) this.setState({publish_date}) this.setState({content}) this.setState({image}) } }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } componentDidMount(){ this.getUsersArticle() } render() { return (

this.setState({ title: e.target.value })} className="form-control"/>

) } } function mapStateToProps(state) { const { auth } = state return { auth } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(ArticaleEdit)
